name: Stickman Epic Archer
description:
Take up the bow, aim your arrow and fire away to become the most Legendary Archer stickman!

Stickman Epic Archer an intense physic-based archery game. The game also has many character and weapons.
Just tap on the screen, pull and let an arrow from a bow to fly. Prove yourself the ultimate archer of all times.
Feature:
- Easy control with addictive touch of hitting.
- Compete rankings with everybody.
- Dual with opponents around the world.

Choose your character and claim your victory let the world know.
